survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Mobile Banking App Features Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on user satisfaction with various features of mobile banking apps to help improve functionality and user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use your mobile banking app?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to gauge frequency of use. This helps segment users for further questions.

script.question_text: How often do you use your mobile banking app?

questions.question_text: Which of the following mobile banking features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to identify most-used features. Include 'Other' option for additional feedback.

script.question_text: Which of the following mobile banking features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the overall user experience of your mobile banking app? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction rating. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the overall user experience of your mobile banking app? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)

questions.question_text: What do you like most about your mobile banking app?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text with character limit.

script.question_text: What do you like most about your mobile banking app?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your mobile banking app?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather actionable feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text with character limit.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your mobile banking app?
